text: Jane Naana Opoku-Agyemang (n√©e Sam; born 22 November 1951) is a Ghanaian academic and politician who has been the Vice President of Ghana since 2025. She is the first female vice president in the country's history. She was the Minister for Education from February 2013 to January 2017. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian educators Category:Vice presidents of Ghana
title: Jane Naana Opoku-Agyemang
